column5: Looking for recommendations on a camp with housekeeping cabins in the Nestor Falls area on Lake of the Woods. Would like a drive to camp with good (prefer paved) road to bring our own boat. Also protected docks that are wind protected. Looking to mainly fish Walleye and donâ€™t want to have to travel 30 minutes by boat to get to good fishing.

It's a 5 minute boat in lodge; you can bring your own. Super clean. Great fishing, Sheltered docks. Walleye abound all around the lodge. They have housekeeping cabins. Lake of the Woods is beautiful. http://youngswildernesscamp.com/
Looking for a drive to camp by vehicle. Any suggestions?

Bergy, Skip Nestor Falls. Go to Morson. Easy crossing at Baudette. All blacktop roads. Stay at Red Wing Lodge, protected docks. You are centrally located then, more options. I did the Nestor Falls thing for 2 years, that was enough for me. Been going to Morson for 20+ now. You can PM me, if you like about details. Brett
X2 on morson. We stay on an island to get closer to the best fishing but there's a reason some guide boats from Nestor falls boat clear over in milesbay.
Hey that sounds great. I've fished Nestor myself and ready for a change. Any dispensaries up that way? Fort Fran or Baudette?
